overview.en: iOscar (iOscar Token, Digital Pass in mineral industry) is a tool based on open source blockchain technology and also a decentralized cryptocurrency that represents digital mineral assets. Through iOscar blockchain, asset owners and project operators can maintain a healthy cash flow which helps accelerate the development of the project; investors can experience the process of ones’ investment; and consumers can share the full knowledge of each step of production and participate the problem - solving issues during market circulation of the products.
overview.zh: iOscar(iOscar TOKEN 矿产行业数字通证) 是一种基于区块链开源技术工具，代表数字化矿产资产的加密数字货币。 通过iOscar资产拥有方以及项目运营方可迅速获取现金流，加速推进项目发展。投资者能得到轻松便捷的矿产类项目投资体验。消费者能清晰知道每一块矿石加工品的溯源信息，解决市场流通金矿产品的问题。
